alert.note: Alert for O'Brien; Osceola (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 5:32PM CDT until July 10 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR OSCEOLA AND NORTHERN O`BRIEN COUNTIES... At 530 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Melvin, or 8 miles south of Sibley, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 5:21 pm, pea to golf ball sized hail was reported near Ashton, Iowa. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Melvin around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Hartley, Ocheyedan and Harris. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
